title: Goodbye
lyrics:
I feel it move, I feel it ache
It's sad to see how much you change
I slip into a cold lake
Now I just feel it slip away
Into a light

That I once knew

I swam deep

And thought of you



I like the thought you think of me

It softer as I start to sink

The trees were sex, an orange sky

It is so sad to say goodbye



Into a light

That I once knew

I swam deep

And thought of you
